title: No train services between Tanah Merah and Changi Airport

updates.text: Early closure lifted: Tanah Merah, Expo & Changi Airport (both bounds), 5 May’17. These stations will resume normal operating hours.
Due to track work,there will be no train svcs b/w Tanah Merah and Changi (both bounds) from 11pm tonight & 5 May’17. https://t.co/pVhqiss9cU
No train svcs between Tanah Merah & Changi (both bounds) from 11pm on 28 Apr & 5 May’17 due to track work. More info https://t.co/pVhqiss9cU
